full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DPAL CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YAB YUM GYI BSGOM BZLAS NYAMS SU LEN TSUL GNAD DON SNYING PO DANG DE'I BKA' STOD GTER BSRUNG BCAS KYI MCHOD THABS 'KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, ,
